fields.name: description
fields.comment: The description of the invoice item

fields.name: quantity
fields.comment: The quantity of the invoice item. Zero if not defined

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.comment: The unit price of the invoice item. MUST be number

fields.name: total
fields.comment: The total price for this item (quantity * unitPrice)

fields.name: currency
fields.comment: The currency for unit price. Default value is "USD"
